title: Web Library Rollup Target
description: Packages a library for different web usages (ESM, CommonJS).

main.description: The path to the entry file, relative to project.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

outputFileName.description: Name of the main output file. Defaults same basename as 'main' file.

deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

allowJs.description: Allow JavaScript files to be compiled.

format.description: List of module formats to output. Defaults to matching format from tsconfig (e.g. CJS for CommonJS, and ESM otherwise).

external.description: A list of external modules that will not be bundled (`react`, `react-dom`, etc.). Can also be set to `all` (bundle nothing) or `none` (bundle everything).

rollupConfig.description: Path to a function which takes a rollup config and returns an updated rollup config.

extractCss.description: CSS files will be extracted to the output folder. Alternatively custom filename can be provided (e.g. styles.css)

babelUpwardRootMode.description: Whether to set rootmode to upward. See https://babeljs.io/docs/en/options#rootmode

generateExportsField.description: Update the output package.json file's 'exports' field. This field is used by Node and bundles.

additionalEntryPoints.description: Additional entry-points to add to exports field in the package.json file.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

skipTypeCheck.description: Whether to skip TypeScript type checking.

skipTypeField.description: Prevents 'type' field from being added to compiled package.json file. Use this if you are having an issue with this field.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply `glob`. Defaults to the project root.

output.description: Relative path within the output folder.
